EmailTemplate.name: Detractor Followup Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Detractor Alert / Action Required for {!Case.Contact}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Contact} from {!Case.Account} recently completed the NCR Customer Relationship Survey and was classified as a Detractor.
If you are not the Account Manager for this contact, see instructions below to Change Owner and reassign the case.
Please follow-up with this customer as soon as possible. You can click on the link below to access the case. From there you can click on the customer contact name to view their survey.
DO NOT mention Detractor classification. That is an internal term and should not be discussed with the customer. Keep the discussion positive and productive, focused on actions that will improve the overall relationship. Review their survey feedback, ask probing questions, listen closely, and learn how NCR can earn higher ratings from them in the future. After following up with the customer, please click on this link: {!Case.Link} and use Edit/Close buttons to update required fields and close the case. Document your planned actions in the case and update the status as work progresses to completion.
How to Update Follow-Up Case:
1. CLICK ALERT LINK in the original alert sent to you, or click link in SUBJECT column of report to open a specific case. 2. CLICK CHANGE OWNER BUTTON if necessary to reassign to a different account owner. 3. CLICK CONTACT NAME to open contact record and view survey feedback with all responses. 4. CLICK BACK in your browser to return to the follow-up case so you can edit and make updates. 5. CLICK EDIT BUTTON in the case to update all required fields including any planned actions. 6. UPDATE STATUS to reflect your follow-up progress: New – (Default) no action has been taken yet In Progress – follow-up in progress with the customer Follow-up Completed – customer discussion documented in case including key issues and planned actions 7. CLICK SAVE BUTTON to save all changes when completed.
